overview_description.description: We provide an energy demand management platform that connects energy providers with energy demanding appliances. We solve the problem of wasting valuable renewable energy by rewarding appliance owners for shifting their electricity demand to times when renewable energy is abundant. We put renewable energy to work. Efficient, scalable and fully automated!
